profile_explanation: Please enter your personal information. You are the only one who can read or diclose this information. It is required to request your credentials.
request_credential_explanation: Select the credential you need to be issued. This credential is stored in your phone, no one will be able to use it but you.
confirm_request_explanation: Confirm sharing the information requested by the credential issuer.
confirm_sharing: Confirm sharing the information requested by the credential issuer
private_sending_notice: This information will be sent privately to the issuer in order to certify the credentials.
missing_requirements: Incomplete information for the request. Please add it in the profile section.
presentation_error: Error receiving presentation from the server
short_seed_error: The seed should be at least 12 words.
security_words_explanation: This sequence of 12 words is the only way to regain access to your account in case you lose it. They will be available in your settings at any time.
security_words_write_down: We recommend you to write these words down in a piece of paper and keep it safe.
create_pin_explanation: Secure your app access with a 4-digit PIN
no_mnemonic_warning: To request credentials, please secure your wallet first.
made_secure_copy: Have you made a secure copy of your security words in the same order?
you_will_need: You will need them for the next step.
reenter_words: Please re-enter your security words in the same order to continue
no_credentials: You don't have any credentials yet.
are_you_sure_remove: Are you sure you want to remove this credential from the app? This can not be undone
restore_access_explanation: Please enter your 12 security words in order to reset your PIN number.
pull_down_refresh: Pull down to refresh the status of pending credentials.
restoring_credentials: Your credentials are currently being restored, please don't close the app.
subject: Subject
copy_settings_explanation: Copies settings, version and DID. No private data will be added to the clipboard.
no_identity_explanation: No credentials were found using this mnemonic. Check that it is correct, or create a new identity using this mnemonic.
checking_status: Checking status of credentials, please wait.
